<style lang="scss">
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

}

    box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
    font-size: 62.5%;/*10px*/
    /*變數的寫法*/
    --page-width: 1500px;
    --bg-color: rgb(199, 199, 199);
    text-align: center;
}

body {
    margin: 0;
}
</style>
